item.title: Emmys Nominations Snubs: ‘Squid Game’ Shut Out, ‘Handmaid’s Tale’ Only Lands One Nod — Uzo Aduba Surprises
item.description: Selena Gomez, who scored her first acting nomination for her role on ‘Only Murders in the Building’ last year, was also left out of this year’s nominees, along with ‘Andor’ star Diego Luna and ‘White

item.title: Academy Museum and CJ ENM Partner Up for Korean Content-Themed Event Ahead of KCON
item.description: The event, titled “K-Culture Night at Academy Museum with KCON,” will celebrated the K-pop-focused festival’s 13th anniversary with idols, actors and more.
